info.title: Inventory API
info.description: API for managing inventory items, categories, tags, and folders.

get.summary: Check if the server is healthy

post.description: Authenticate user and get JWT token

get.description: Get information about the currently authenticated user
Get a list of all users in the system
Get a specific user by their ID

delete.description: Delete a user from the system

get.description: Get a list of all inventory items
Get a specific inventory item by its ID

patch.description: Update an existing inventory item (partial update)

post.description: Upload an image for an inventory item

400.description: Invalid file type or no image provided

get.description: Get a list of all categories

post.description: Create a new category for organizing items

get.description: Get a specific category by its ID

delete.description: Delete a category from the system

get.description: Get a list of all tags

post.description: Create a new tag for labeling items

get.description: Get a specific tag by its ID

delete.description: Delete a tag from the system

get.description: Get a list of all folders with their full paths

post.description: Create a new folder for organizing items in MinIO and mobile app

get.description: Get a specific folder by its ID with full path information

delete.description: Delete a folder from the system

patch.description: Update an existing folder including its full path (partial update)
